Norin, the Scaredy-Cat EOP
R R 1 Creature - Human Coward Creature 2/1
2 Once each turn, when a player casts a spell, activates a non-mana ability, attacks, or blocks, you may exile Norin, the Scaredy-Cat. Return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control at the beginning of the next end step.
